remarks: Lemma for ~ climcnds : bound the original series by the condensed series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2014.)
statement:
climcnds.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
climcnds.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN ) -> 0 <_ ( F ` k ) ) $.
climcnds.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN ) -> ( F ` ( k + 1 ) ) <_ ( F ` k ) ) $.
climcnds.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. NN0 ) -> ( G ` n ) = ( ( 2 ^ n ) x. ( F ` ( 2 ^ n ) ) ) ) $.
climcndslem1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( seq 1 ( + , F ) ` ( ( 2 ^ ( N + 1 ) ) - 1 ) ) <_ ( seq 0 ( + , G ) ` N ) ) $.
$d F k n $.
$d G k n $.
$d k n ph $.
